title: Italian Amb. Armellin calls on DPM/FM Dar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 29 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/ Foreign Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Tuesday received Italian Ambassador Marilina Armellin at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
“DPM highlighted the importance Pakistan attached to its relations with Italy and exchanged views on issues of mutual interest with a focus on trade and investment, migration and mobility, education and people to people contacts,” a post on X said.
During the meeting, regional and global issues also came under discussion, it was further added.
